data.eml:eml: Shallow-water stenopodidean and caridean shrimps from Abrolhos Archipelago, Brazil: new records and updated checklist

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Soledade, Guidomar O., Fonseca, Mytalle S., Almeida, Alexandre O. (2015): Shallow-water stenopodidean and caridean shrimps from Abrolhos Archipelago, Brazil: new records and updated checklist. Zootaxa 3905 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3905.1.3
